title: Spiritual Chiropractic - Unitarian Universalist Congregation of Cleveland
description: Easter is a celebration of renewal and rebirth. We might forget that renewal is possible for us. We adopt a posture of resignation sometimes, assuming that the way things have been in the past is the way they always will be. What would it be like for us to adopt a posture of renewal instead? cleaned_text: Easter is a celebration of renewal and rebirth. We might forget that renewal is possible for us. We adopt a posture of resignation sometimes, assuming that the way things have been in the past is the way they always will be. What would it be like for us to adopt a posture of renewal instead? How can we discover a newness of life through a bit of spiritual chiropractic? See you in-person Sunday morning. Services will also be live-streamed on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpFWcWzygyq8mbVm30qavdg). Worship Leader: Rev. Randy Partain Worship Associate: Collins [Notes](https://uucleveland.org/musical-musings-april-17-apr-23-2022/) on this week's music. [Youth Religious Education](https://uucleveland.org/learning/youth-programs/) will meet this week.
